import React, { Component } from "react"; import { MDBContainer, MDBBtn, MDBModal, MDBModalBody, MDBModalHeader, MDBModalFooter, MDBInput, MDBDatePickerV5, } from "mdbreact"; import UploadEventStyles from '../css/UploadEvent.module.css' class UploadEvent extends Component { state = { modal16: false, eventName: "", filePath: "", date: "", audiance: "", shortDescription: "", fullDescription: "", }; toggle = (nr) => () => { let modalNumber = "modal" + nr; this.setState({ [modalNumber]: !this.state[modalNumber], }); }; render() { return ( MDBModal הוסף מסע
this.setState({ ...this.state, eventName: e }, () => console.log(e) ) } />
this.setState({ filePath: event.target.files[0] }, () => console.log(this.state.filePath) ) } />
this.setState({ ...this.state, date: e.getFullYear() }) } /> this.setState({ ...this.state, audiance: e }, () => console.log(e) ) } /> this.setState({ ...this.state, shortDescription: e }, () => console.log(e) ) } /> this.setState({ ...this.state, fullDescription: e }, () => console.log(this.state) ) } />
Close Save changes ); } } export default UploadEvent;
